metadata.title: My Little Pony Rainbow Dash Pinkie Pie Girls Cosplay T-Shirt and Leggings Little Kid to Big Kid
features: Officially licensed My Little Pony little girls short sleeve graphic tee shirt and cute and stylish leggings
All over print design; Ruffle peplum top; Dress-up cosplay design; Awesome screen print design; Elastic waist for better fit; Pull on closure
Durable and long-lasting graphic tshirt and leggings costume set with a comfortable fit and an easy to dress design making it the essential cosplay outfit for your active kid
Youth fashion tees and pants with cool character designs your child will love to wear; made from soft clothing material that is safe on childrenâ€™s skin
Perfect for dress-up, Halloween costume, birthday gift, every day wear, Christmas holiday gift, outdoor play and party outfit
description: Your little girl is ready for fun and play in this My Little Pony Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt & Leggings. Journey to the magical land of Equestria and join the Ponies, Pegasus ponies, Unicorns, and Alicorns on all their latest adventures. Your little girl will love wearing this short sleeve graphic tee shirt and cute and stylish leggings featuring her favorite My Little Pony characters.
